channel.title: About on Kaho Abe 阿部香穂

item.title: About
item.description: “If going vroom makes the car go forward, maybe saying vroom, backwards would make it back up. Moorv.” -- Beverly Cleary, Ralph S. Mouse Short Bio Kaho Abe is a game designer and media artist based in NYC interested in improving social and personal experiences through the use of technology, fashion and games. She designs games and builds custom controllers with the hope to bring people together in new ways, face to face, in public spaces.
